page.title: 14Parkend School's Centenary
page.content: On Friday June 7th 1985 it was Parkend County Primary School's Centenary. There were many activities and events on that day and during 1985.There was a book published with details ofthe history of the school many photographs _ old and new, and reminiscences of staff, puils and friends.We mounted an exibition of interesting artefacts ranging from original childrens slates to the latest in computer usage .There was a party, a commemorative tree planting, presentation of Centenary Medals, a huge raffle, a rounders match, an old fashioned PE lesson and a special service to which past vicars and the Bishop of Tewkesbury attended. A video was made of the whole celebration.
